name: The Myujishan Saga: The Forgotten Band (Myujishan LLC)
name_original: The Myujishan Saga: The Forgotten Band (Myujishan LLC)
description:
A new seven part saga from Myujishan LLC!

Years ago, there was a humble music group, after walking to the bus from a concert, the lead singer had an incident that caused him to forget EVERYTHING!

This game was created by Quincy Guidera, developed by Quincy Guidera using Visual Novelty, and produced by Myujishan LLC.

GoFundMe https://www.gofundme.com/myujishan-saga-the-forgotten-band?sharetype=teams&membe...
